info.name: Community Document Server
info.summary: Document server for OnlyOffice, community edition
info.description:
Document server for OnlyOffice, community edition.
The community document server was originally designed to make it easy to get OnlyOffice running in a Nextcloud instance without the need to setup an external document server. It only supports running on x86-64 Linux servers.
WARNING:
This app was not developed by Ascensio and should only be seen as a "proof of concept" and is not intended for regular use!
If you want to set up an instance for regular use, please see https://onlyoffice.com and https://apps.nextcloud.com/apps/onlyoffice for options for getting the official document server and Nextcloud connector by Ascensio.
info.author: Robin Appelman
